title: SOLD: 1887 Baseball Currency With Cap Anson & Albert Spalding
author: calvindog

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1887 Baseball Currency With Cap Anson & Albert Spalding
posts.post_content:
Rare circa 1887 ad currency promoting Chicago's M.M. Carpenter Boots, Shoes and Rubber Goods.  Includes Cap Anson and Albert Spalding images, along with other members of the Chicago White Sox including Hall of Famers Dell Darling, Jimmy Ryan, Jocko Flynn and Marty Sullivan. $725 delivered.  PayPal FF/Venmo/Wire/Zelle accepted. Email or PM if interested. 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2rag714][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/54582407075_ae78629721_z.jpg[/img][/url]
